title: Grin and Bear It
description: THIS BOOK IS A STANDALONE. YOU DO NOT HAVE TO HAVE READ OTHER BOOKS IN THE SERIES.I’m a strong independent woman, but sometimes I just want someone else to fix my life. Enter four, big, strong, hunky someones...Lately I've got a lot of problems.My house is falling apart.My situationship just imploded because he messaged me for a date and he meant to invite someone else.But I’m a good teacher, right?So why have two of my students gone completely off the rails?And worse, while trying to drown my sorrows, instead of ringing my bestie, I ring him.One of my student’s guardians.But that rich velvety voice on the other end of the line asks me to tell him all the things that are going wrong.And then he tells me he’s gonna fix all of it.The problem is I’m their nephews’ history teacher.And these four men think I’m their fated mate.This book is a standalone. HEA guaranteed.
author: Sam   Hall
